author: hlship
msg: Add an ApplicationDefaults extension point to complement FactoryDefaults extension point.
Have the LoggingInterceptor log all runtime exceptions (in addition to declared checked exceptions).
Change AbstractServiceInterceptorFactory to not use the Initializable interface; change the MDD to configure it using BuilderFactory.

author: hlship
msg: Temporarily turn off the tests for EJBProxyFactory.
Re-code EJBProxyFactory to use ClassFactory instead of JDK proxies.
Make it easier to have the RegistryBuilder parse additional modules deployment descriptors with non-standard names or locations.

author: hlship
msg: Make some improvements to the documentation.

author: hlship
msg: Add support for deferred service proxies; objects which force the creation of the service implementation only when a service interface method is invoked.

author: hlship
msg: Fix error in raw XML -> formatted HTML conversion that prevented nested elements from appearing in the output.
